entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text: @realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX hey trump did you hear that New Zealand's Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern said the coronavirus was "currently" eliminated, wow wish we had a powerful leader like here here, plus I heard she hasn't once whined about how mean the media was being to her
